definition: to pass sth around (for others to look at)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: The head of the discussion group passed the research plan round and then started to assign work.
sentences.chinese: 課題組長讓大家傳觀了研究方案，開始佈置工作。
